description: The graph depicts the frequency of headlines mention in relevant Russian-language media. It uses regex expressions for requesting the words "Serb" in the [Tableau worksheet](https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/viacheslav.romanov/viz/Mediafutures-cleaneddata540k/dailycountnostack). Timeframe: 01.01.2022 - 31.07.2022. Data source: GDELT.
chart_title: Frequency of headlines mentioning the “Serb” marker.
name: cold_war_ii-tableau-serb
